mapper.sql: GUARANTY_ID, COLLATERAL_TYPE_CD, PARTY_TYPE_CD, COLLATERAL_NUM, COLLATERAL_STATUS_CD, COLLATERAL_NAME, BOOK_VALUE, BOOK_NET_VALUE, MARKET_VALUE, EVAL_VALUE_CURRENCY_CD, EVAL_VALUE, CCB_ASSESSED_VALUE_CURRENCY_CD, CCB_ASSESSED_VALUE, ACQUIRE_WAY_OF_COLLATERAL_CD, COMMON_ASSETS_IND, COMMON_OWNER_NAME, WAY_GUARANTY_EFFECTIVE_CD, COLLATERAL_SETUP_IND, SET_GUARANTY_AMT_IN_CCB, RENTED_LICENSED_IND, RENTER_NAME, SET_GUARANTY_AMT_OUT_CCB, LEASE_EXPIRATION_DATE, CUSTOMER_NUM, SUBMITTING_DATE, CURRENCY_CD, COLLATERAL_DISPOSE, OTHER_NOTE, SET_GUARANTY_AMT, PROVINCE_CD, CITY_CD, DISTRICT_CD, STREET_ADDRESS, NATIONALITY_CD, MERCHANDISE_TYPE, RIGHT_CERT_TYPE_CD, RIGHT_CERTIFICATION_NUM, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, COLLATERAL_CATALOG_CD, DATA_CREAT_USER_NUM, DATA_CREATOR_ORG_CD, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NUM, LAST_UPDATE_ORG_CD, TAKEOVER_IND, ALL_PLEDGE_IND, FORBID_CIRCULATE_IND, NATIONALISATION_IND, PROPERTY_DISPUTED_IND, INVALID_IND, BLEMISH_IND, MP_TYPE, BLEMISH_NOTE, HANDOVER_DATE, K75ZCMS, KEEP_SPECIAL_REQ, VALUATOR, EVALUATE_DATE, ASSET_STATUS, CUSTOMER_TYPE, SETTLED_ASSETS_IND, TIME_MARK, IMPAWN_AMOUNT, IMPAWN_AMOUNT_CD, IMPAWN_EXPIRE_DATE, IMPAWN_GET_DATE, REGISTER_IND, COLLATERAL_CARD_DEPARTMENT, IS_STATE_ASSET, IS_STATE_SECTOR_APPROVAL, IS_MORTGAGE_ALL_ASSET, SETTLED_SOURCE, ASSETS_SOURCE_BACKUP, COLLATERAL_SEQ
mapper.select:
SELECT T2.PARTY_NUM, T2.PARTY_NAME, T3.CERT_TYPE,T3.CERT_NUM,T2.IS_POTENTIAL_CUST,T2.PARTY_ID ,T3.IS_FARMER,T3.PHONE_NUMBER,T3.IS_THIRD_CUST, T4.GUARANTY_ID,T4.COLLATERAL_NAME,T4.COLLATERAL_TYPE_CD,T4.CUSTOMER_TYPE,T4.COLLATERAL_NUM, T4.MARKET_VALUE,T4.CURRENCY_CD,T4.TIME_MARK FROM TB_GRT_COLLATERAL T4 JOIN TB_CSM_PARTY T2 ON T4.CUSTOMER_NUM = T2.PARTY_NUM JOIN TB_CSM_NATURAL_PERSON T3 ON T2.PARTY_ID = T3.PARTY_ID WHERE T2.PARTY_TYPE_CD = '02' AND T4.DATA_CREAT_USER_NUM = '200555' AND T4.DATA_CREATOR_ORG_CD = '0700'
AND T4.CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{customerType}
AND T2.PARTY_NUM LIKE '%'||#{partyNum}||'%'
AND T2.PARTY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{partyName}||'%'
AND T3.CERT_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{certType}||'%'
AND T3.CERT_NUM LIKE '%'||#{certNum}||'%'
AND T4.COLLATERAL_TYPE_CD = #{collateralTypeCd}
AND T4.COLLATERAL_NAME LIKE '%'||#{collateralName}||'%'
AND T3.IS_FARMER LIKE '%'||#{isFarmer}||'%'
AND T3.PHONE_NUMBER LIKE '%'||#{phoneNumber}||'%'
ORDER BY
${orderField}
T4.TIME_MARK
${sort}
desc

select * from (select count(*) AS TOGETHER from TB_GRT_TOGETHER_CORRELATIVE where GUARANTY_ID = #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) r1, (select count(*) AS INSURANCE from TB_GRT_COLLATERAL_INSURANCE where GUARANTY_ID = #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) r2, (select count(*) AS REGISTRATION from TB_GRT_COLLATERAL_REGISTRATION where GUARANTY_ID = #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) r3, (select count(*) AS NOTARIZATION from TB_GRT_COLLATERAL_NOTARIZATION where GUARANTY_ID = #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) r4, (select count(*) AS ACCIDENT from TB_GRT_COLLATERAL_ACCIDENT where GUARANTY_ID = #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) r5

update TB_GRT_COLLATERAL
COLLATERAL_TYPE_CD = #{collateralTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTY_TYPE_CD = #{partyTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLATERAL_NUM = #{collateralNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLATERAL_STATUS_CD = #{collateralStatusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLATERAL_NAME = #{collateralName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOOK_VALUE = #{bookValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BOOK_NET_VALUE = #{bookNetValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MARKET_VALUE = #{marketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EVAL_VALUE_CURRENCY_CD = #{evalValueCurrencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVAL_VALUE = #{evalValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CCB_ASSESSED_VALUE_CURRENCY_CD = #{ccbAssessedValueCurrencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CCB_ASSESSED_VALUE = #{ccbAssessedValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACQUIRE_WAY_OF_COLLATERAL_CD = #{acquireWayOfCollateralCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMON_ASSETS_IND = #{commonAssetsInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMMON_OWNER_NAME = #{commonOwnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAY_GUARANTY_EFFECTIVE_CD = #{wayGuarantyEffectiveCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLATERAL_SETUP_IND = #{collateralSetupInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
SET_GUARANTY_AMT_IN_CCB = #{setGuarantyAmtInCcb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENTED_LICENSED_IND = #{rentedLicensedInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
RENTER_NAME = #{renterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SET_GUARANTY_AMT_OUT_CCB = #{setGuarantyAmtOutCcb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEASE_EXPIRATION_DATE = #{leaseExpirationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CUSTOMER_NUM = #{customerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMITTING_DATE = #{submittingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CURRENCY_CD = #{currencyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLATERAL_DISPOSE = #{collateralDispose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_NOTE = #{otherNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SET_GUARANTY_AMT = #{setGuarantyAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROVINCE_CD = #{provinceCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CD = #{cityCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_CD = #{districtCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STREET_ADDRESS = #{streetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATIONALITY_CD = #{nationalityCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANDISE_TYPE = #{merchandiseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RIGHT_CERT_TYPE_CD = #{rightCertTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RIGHT_CERTIFICATION_NUM = #{rightCertificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COLLATERAL_CATALOG_CD = #{collateralCatalogCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_CREAT_USER_NUM = #{dataCreatUserNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_CREATOR_ORG_CD = #{dataCreatorOrgCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_NUM = #{lastUpdateUserNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_ORG_CD = #{lastUpdateOrgCd,jdbcType=CHAR},
TAKEOVER_IND = #{takeoverInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
ALL_PLEDGE_IND = #{allPledgeInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
FORBID_CIRCULATE_IND = #{forbidCirculateInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
NATIONALISATION_IND = #{nationalisationInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROPERTY_DISPUTED_IND = #{propertyDisputedInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
INVALID_IND = #{invalidInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
BLEMISH_IND = #{blemishInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
MP_TYPE = #{mpType,jdbcType=CHAR},
BLEMISH_NOTE = #{blemishNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDOVER_DATE = #{handoverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
K75ZCMS = #{k75zcms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEEP_SPECIAL_REQ = #{keepSpecialReq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALUATOR = #{valuator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVALUATE_DATE = #{evaluateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ASSET_STATUS = #{assetStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLED_ASSETS_IND = #{settledAssetsInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
TIME_MARK = #{timeMark,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMPAWN_AMOUNT = #{impawnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IMPAWN_AMOUNT_CD = #{impawnAmountCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPAWN_EXPIRE_DATE = #{impawnExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMPAWN_GET_DATE = #{impawnGetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGISTER_IND = #{registerInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
COLLATERAL_CARD_DEPARTMENT = #{collateralCardDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_STATE_ASSET = #{isStateAsset,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_STATE_SECTOR_APPROVAL = #{isStateSectorApproval,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_MORTGAGE_ALL_ASSET = #{isMortgageAllAsset,jdbcType=CHAR},
SETTLED_SOURCE = #{settledSource,jdbcType=CHAR},
ASSETS_SOURCE_BACKUP = #{assetsSourceBackup,jdbcType=CHAR},
COLLATERAL_SEQ = #{collateralSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where GUARANTY_ID = #{guarantyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_GRT_COLLATERAL set COLLATERAL_TYPE_CD = #{collateralTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTY_TYPE_CD = #{partyTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLATERAL_NUM = #{collateralNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataCreatUserNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_CREATOR_ORG_CD = #{dataCreatorOrgCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NUM = #{lastUpdateUserNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_ORG_CD = NATIONALISATION_IND = #{nationalisationInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROPERTY_DISPUTED_IND = #{propertyDisputedInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, INVALID_IND = #{invalidInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, BLEMISH_IND = #{blemishInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, MP_TYPE = #{mpType,jdbcType=CHAR}, BLEMISH_NOTE = #{blemishNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HANDOVER_DATE = #{handoverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, K75ZCMS = #{impawnAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IMPAWN_AMOUNT_CD = #{impawnAmountCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPAWN_EXPIRE_DATE = #{impawnExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMPAWN_GET_DATE =
